text: Laurent Duvernay-Tardif — the first medical doctor to play in the NFL — was playing in the biggest game of his life as the Kansas City Chiefs got their first Super Bowl victory in 50 years. He's now on the front line in the fight against the coronavirus. https://t.co/vyyYqs5qDF
